review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2021
name: J.B.
title: Yummy, easy breakfast
review: I've actually been enjoying these quite a bit. Very easy to set and forget to enjoy in the morning. At $3 a bag, it is a LITTLE pricey, but I don't see how they could offer this for less and keep it as convenient. All of the flavors have tasted great so far, if you want to eat it warm I would microwave it unless you want the full flavor of protein in your mouth. (not fun) Keeping these as an office staple! Thanks!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2021
name: Samantha Calhoon
title: Yummy and easy breakfast
review: I love this stuff! Super easy, very delicious and customizable with your choice of milk. The only thing I wish I could do is create my own pack of flavors! I love the Chai and PB.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2021
name: G
title: I was super surprised at how good
review: I was super surprised at how good this oatmeal tasted. I saw an ad on social media and looked up the product on a popular search engine. All reviews were pretty positive. I saw that Amazon sold the product so I decided to place an order. I make good oats on my own but sometimes I get tired of "my" flavor. I have to say I loved each flavor in the combo pack I ordered: blueberry, pancake, bananna, chia. I was pretty sure there was going to be a front runner but I was wrong...each packet was yummy. I used oat "milk" to make the meal. I will say that I think this product is kinda pricey (vegan with shacker cup). I wish they had coupons that I could find. I most likely will order agian. Packing and shipping were good and fast.
